name: FUTURE VISIONS
description:
Future Visions. Travel between Present and Future.

Recently, the gods have not been happy with society's actions. 

In turn, the goddess Amaterasu grants you the ability to see the disasters in the future caused by the gods, or kami.

Your task is to prevent the kami from becoming angry and punishing humanity; in order to do so, you have to beat their trials by showing gratitude to them. 

In this demo, your task takes place in the shrine of the fire kami, Hi no Kagutsuchi. (Hint: Solve the puzzle by interacting with the world around you.)

Controls:

WASD - Forward Movement

Right Mouse Click - Pick Up 

E - Interact 

X - Trigger switch between Present & Future 

We are a group of students from Hanze University studying Game Design and this is our very first Game Jam! Hope you enjoy our game!
